title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 606.27 - Contents of applications
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 606.27 - Contents of applications

State Regulations

Applications and permits shall set forth, sufficient
for identification and location, the access area, and shall specifically set
forth the existing and proposed structure or structures to be erected or placed
on such access area. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
606.27

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
